thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 18 of 288
thread.title: Barb

author: Barb
title: Barb
text: I've received two weeks worth of meals so far from HelloFresh and all six meals have been great. The delivery arrives in one large box with a smaller box for each meal. Proteins are frozen at the bottom of the box. The recipe cards are easy to follow with terrific graphics and step by step instructions. It's actually like a mini cooking lesson for each meal. I've tried things that I have never had before...like parsnips. Who knew they were so good!! It's a great opportunity to try new things and different combinations than my normal routine meals. Finally, all the ingredients have been fresh and first rate.
